unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Jadeja's knee? Remember that nasty fall in the Ranji Trophy match last week? Heard it was serious. Hope he's back soon, especially with the World Cup in Delhi just around the corner. Doctor sahab from AIIMS should check him out if the team doc is stumped. Wishing him a "DDLJ" comeback! Speedy recovery, Jaddu!
